titleStmt.title: An order of the committee of the Lords and Commons at Guild-hall for the defence of the kingdom for the disarming and securing the persons of such as are disaffected to the Parliament :nd [sic] Commonwealth, with citie of Lodon [sic] and Westminster, and the suburbs within three miles of the citie. With a proclamation by the Lord Maior of London.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for I. Iackson, G. Tomlinson, and T. Homer, and are to be sold in the Old Baily,

notesStmt.note: A variant of the edition with line 3 of title beginning "with the cities of London" in place of "with citie of Lodon".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
